documentation.text:
Remove a verified address, and the associated verification hash. If the address is
  unkblock.timestampn to the contract then this does nothing. If the address is successfully removed, this
  function must emit `VerifiedAddressRemoved(addr, msg.sender)`.
  It MUST throw if an attempt is made to remove a verifiedAddress that owns Tokens.
  @param addr The verified address to be removed.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function () pure returns (struct Shareholder.ShareholderStorage storage pointer)
function () pure returns (struct Shareholder.ShareholderStorage storage pointer)

documentation.text:
Update the hash for a verified address known to the contract.
  Upon successful update of a verified address the contract must emit
  `VerifiedAddressUpdated(addr, oldHash, hash, msg.sender)`.
  If the hash is the same as the value already stored then
  no `VerifiedAddressUpdated` event is to be emitted.
  It MUST throw if the hash is zero, or if the address is unverified.
  @param addr The verified address of the person represented by the supplied hash.
  @param hash A new cryptographic hash of the address holder's updated verified information.

function () pure returns (struct Shareholder.ShareholderStorage storage pointer)

documentation.text:
The number of addresses that own tokens.
  @return the number of unique addresses that own tokens.

documentation.text:
Shareholder level:
    1 = non-accredited shareholder
    2 = accredited shareholder
    3 = affiliate shareholder

documentation.text:
If the address is in the `shareholders` array and the forthcoming
  transfer or transferFrom will reduce their balance to 0, then
  we need to remove them from the shareholders array.
  @param addr The address to prune if their balance will be reduced to 0.
@  @dev see https://ethereum.stackexchange.com/a/39311

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "(cancelandReissue) - original investor is not a shareholder"

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "(cancelandReissue) - original investor is not a shareholder"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "(cancelandReissue) - replacement investor is already a shareholder, requires a new wallet"

documentation.text:
Cancel the original address and reissue the Tokens to the replacement address.
  Access to this function MUST be strictly controlled.
  The `original` address MUST be removed from the set of verified addresses.
  Throw if the `original` address supplied is not a 
  Throw if the replacement address is not a verified address.
  This function MUST emit the `VerifiedAddressSuperseded` event.
  @param original The address to be superseded. This address MUST NOT be reused.
  @param replacement The address  that supersedes the original. This address MUST be verified.
